trans-unit.source: >} or >{ indent from current line up to next paragraph
trans-unit.target: >} 或 >{ 从当前行缩进到下一段

trans-unit.source: <} or <{ same un-indent
trans-unit.target: <} 或 <{ 相同的非缩进

trans-unit.source: '<,'> - Within the Visually Selected Range
trans-unit.target: '<,'> -在可视范围内

trans-unit.source: 5== will indent five lines from the current cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 5== 将从当前光标位置缩进五行。

trans-unit.source: :%le3 or :%le 3 or :%left3 or :%left 3 will align the entire file by padding with three spaces.
trans-unit.target: :%le3 或 :%le 3 或 :%left3 或 :%left 3 将通过填充三个空格来对齐整个文件。

trans-unit.source: :5,7 le 3 will align lines 5 through 7 by padding them with three spaces.
trans-unit.target: :5,7 le 3 将第5至7行对齐，并在其中填充了三个空格。

trans-unit.source: : tells vi you will enter an instruction for the highlighted text.
trans-unit.target: : 告诉vi您将输入突出显示文本的说明。

trans-unit.source: :le without any value or :le 0 will left align with a padding of 0.
trans-unit.target: :le 没有任何值或 :le 0 将左对齐为0的填充。

trans-unit.source: V means start selecting text.
trans-unit.target: V 表示开始选择文本。

trans-unit.source: gg=G will indent the whole file from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: gg=G 将从上到下缩进整个文件。

trans-unit.source: jjjj arrows down four lines, highlighting four lines.
trans-unit.target: jjjj 箭头向下四行，突出显示四行。

trans-unit.source: le 3 means indent highlighted text three lines.
trans-unit.target: le 3 表示将突出显示的文本缩进三行。

trans-unit.source: s/^/ /g - Insert 3 spaces at the beginning of every line within the whole range
trans-unit.target: s/^/ /g 在整个范围内的每一行的开头插入3个空格

trans-unit.source: s/^/\t/g - Insert Tab at the beginning of every line within the whole range
trans-unit.target: s/^/\t/g 在整个范围内的每一行的开头插入 Tab

trans-unit.source: In ex mode you can use :left or :le to align lines a specified amount. Specifically, :left will Left align lines in the [range]. It sets the indent in the lines to [indent] (default 0).
trans-unit.target: 在 ex mode 您可以使用 :left 或 :le 将行对齐指定的数量。具体来说， :left 将使[range]中的行左对齐。它将行中的缩进设置为[indent]（默认为0）。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the answer already given and accepted, it is also possible to place a marker and then indent everything from the current cursor to the marker.
trans-unit.target: 除了已经给出和接受的答案外，还可以放置一个标记，然后缩进从当前光标到该标记的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: Note that >Nj means indent from current line to N lines below. If the number of lines to be indented is large, it could take some seconds for the user to count the proper value of N. To save valuable seconds you can activate the option of relative number with set relativenumber (available since Vim version 7.3).
trans-unit.target: 注意， >Nj 表示从当前行缩进到下面的 N 行。如果要缩进的行数很大，则用户可能需要花费几秒钟来计算 N 的适当值。为了节省宝贵的时间，您可以激活具有 set relativenumber 的relative number选项（自Vim版本7.3起可用）。

trans-unit.source: Note: 'gg' means go to line 1, '=' is the indent command, and 'G' moves the cursor to the end of file.
trans-unit.target: 注意：“ gg”表示转到第1行，“ =”是缩进命令，而“ G”将光标移动到file的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The beauty of Vim's UI is that its consistency. Editing commands are made up of the command and a cursor move. The cursor moves are always the same:
trans-unit.target: Vim的UI的魅力在于它的一致性。编辑命令是由命令和光标移动组成的。光标移动的动作始终是一样的。

trans-unit.source: The following will appear in the command line: :'<,'>

trans-unit.source: These are useful when you want to indent a specific range of lines, without moving your cursor.
trans-unit.target: 当你想在不移动光标的情况下缩进特定的行数范围时,这些都很有用。

trans-unit.source: These commands apply to the current line:
trans-unit.target: 这些命令适用于当前行。

trans-unit.source: This answer summarises the other answers and comments of this question, and it adds extra information based on the Vim documentation and the Vim wiki. For conciseness, this answer doesn't distinguish between Vi and Vim-specific commands.
trans-unit.target: 该答案总结了该问题的其他答案和评论，并基于Vim文档和Vim Wiki添加了更多信息。为简洁起见，此答案不区分Vi和Vim特定命令。

trans-unit.source: This indents the entire file!
trans-unit.target: 这就把整个文件缩进了!

trans-unit.source: This is how Vim works: one has to remember only the cursor movements and the commands, and how to mix them. So my answer to this question would be "go to one end of the block of lines you want to indent, and then type the
trans-unit.target: 这就是Vim的工作原理:只需要记住光标的动作和命令,以及如何混合。所以我对这个问题的回答是 "到你要缩进的行块的一端,然后键入

trans-unit.source: This is not a uni-tasker. It works:
trans-unit.target: 这并不是单挑机。它的作用。

trans-unit.source: This is only for a cpp file. You can do this for another file type, also just by modifying the filetype...
trans-unit.target: 这只是针对一个cpp文件。你也可以对其他文件类型进行这样的操作,只需修改文件类型......

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you would prefer not to change your shiftwidth or use any set directives and is flexible enough to work with TABS or SPACES or any other character.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想更改 shiftwidth 或使用任何 set 指令，这将很有用，并且足够灵活以使用TABS或SPACES或任何其他字符。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you don't want to change indentation/tab settings in vimrc or to remember them to change it while editing.
trans-unit.target: 当您不想在 vimrc 中更改缩进/制表符设置或不想在编辑时记住要更改的设置时，此功能很有用。

trans-unit.source: This works in Vim and gVim.
trans-unit.target: 这可以在Vim和gVim中使用。

trans-unit.source: Thus, enter ma where you want the top of your indented block, cursor down as far as you need and then type >'a (note that "a" can be substituted for any valid marker name). This is sometimes easier than 5>> or vjjj>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在要缩进的块的顶部输入 ma ，将光标向下移动到所需的位置，然后键入 >'a （请注意，“ a ”可以代替任何有效的标记名）。有时比 5>> 或 vjjj> 容易。

trans-unit.source: Thus, for indenting the lines from the cursor position to the top of the screen you do
trans-unit.target: 因此,对于从光标位置到屏幕顶部的缩进线,你可以做如下操作

trans-unit.target: 要更改列（使用 c 而不是 I ）。

trans-unit.source: To indent n lines below the current line
trans-unit.target: 在当前行下方缩进 n 行

trans-unit.source: To set indent to three spaces, type le 3 and press enter. This is what appears: :'<,'>le 3

trans-unit.source: Using Python a lot, I find myself needing frequently needing to shift blocks by more than one indent. You can do this by using any of the block selection methods, and then just enter the number of indents you wish to jump right before the >
trans-unit.target: 大量使用Python，我发现自己经常需要将块移位多个缩进。您可以使用任何块选择方法来执行此操作，然后只需在 > 之前输入要跳转的缩进数量即可

trans-unit.source: V
trans-unit.target: V

trans-unit.source: Vim has intelligent indentation based on filetype. Try adding this to your .vimrc:
trans-unit.target: Vim有基于文件类型的智能缩进。试着在你的.vimrc中加入这个功能。

trans-unit.source: Voila! The text is moved (empty lines remain empty with no spaces)
trans-unit.target: 呜呼! 文字被移动了(空行保持空行,没有空格)。

trans-unit.source: You can extend this idea to multiple files:
trans-unit.target: 你可以把这个想法扩展到多个文件。

trans-unit.source: You can replace { with } or B, e.g. =iB is a valid block indent command. Take a look at "Indent a Code Block" for a nice example to try these commands out on.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将 { 替换为 } 或 B ，例如 =iB 是有效的块缩进命令。看一下“缩进代码块”，这是一个很好的例子，可以尝试这些命令。

trans-unit.source: You can set these in your .vimrc file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在.vimrc文件中进行设置。

trans-unit.source: You can use the norm i command to insert given text at the beginning of the line. To insert 10 spaces before lines 2-10:
